verses.kjv: Whoso loveth instruction loveth knowledge: but he that hateth reproof is brutish.
verses.ct: Anyone who loves being corrected loves knowledge, but whoever hates being rebuked is foolish.

verses.kjv: A good man obtaineth favour of the LORD: but a man of wicked devices will he condemn.
verses.ct: A good person earns the LORD's favor, but the LORD condemns those who scheme to do evil.

verses.kjv: A man shall not be established by wickedness: but the root of the righteous shall not be moved.
verses.ct: No one becomes secure through wickedness, but the roots of the righteous cannot be uprooted.

verses.kjv: A virtuous woman is a crown to her husband: but she that maketh ashamed is as rottenness in his bones.
verses.ct: A capable wife is her husband's crowning glory, but a wife who brings shame is like decay in his bones.

verses.kjv: The thoughts of the righteous are right: but the counsels of the wicked are deceit.
verses.ct: The plans of the righteous are honest, but the advice of the wicked is full of deception.

verses.kjv: The words of the wicked are to lie in wait for blood: but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them.
verses.ct: The words of the wicked are an ambush meant to kill, but the speech of the upright rescues them.

verses.kjv: The wicked are overthrown, and are not: but the house of the righteous shall stand.
verses.ct: The wicked are toppled and disappear, but the household of the righteous endures.

verses.kjv: A man shall be commended according to his wisdom: but he that is of a perverse heart shall be despised.
verses.ct: A person is praised based on their good sense, but someone with a twisted mind will be looked down on.

verses.kjv: He that is despised, and hath a servant, is better than he that honoureth himself, and lacketh bread.
verses.ct: Better to be an ordinary person who has a servant than to pretend to be important while having nothing to eat.

verses.kjv: A righteous man regardeth the life of his beast: but the tender mercies of the wicked are cruel.
verses.ct: A righteous person cares about the well-being of their animals, but even the kindest acts of the wicked are cruel.

verses.kjv: He that tilleth his land shall be satisfied with bread: but he that followeth vain persons is void of understanding.
verses.ct: Whoever works their land will have plenty of food, but anyone who chases empty pursuits has no sense.

verses.kjv: The wicked desireth the net of evil men: but the root of the righteous yieldeth fruit.
verses.ct: The wicked crave what evil people have stolen, but the root of the righteous produces fruit.

verses.kjv: The wicked is snared by the transgression of his lips: but the just shall come out of trouble.
verses.ct: An evil person is trapped by their own sinful words, but the righteous escape from trouble.

verses.kjv: A man shall be satisfied with good by the fruit of his mouth: and the recompence of a man’s hands shall be rendered unto him.
verses.ct: A person enjoys good things from the words they speak, and the work of their hands comes back to reward them.

verses.kjv: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.
verses.ct: A fool thinks their own way is right, but a wise person listens to advice.

verses.kjv: A fool’s wrath is presently known: but a prudent man covereth shame.
verses.ct: A fool shows their anger immediately, but a sensible person overlooks an insult.

verses.kjv: He that speaketh truth sheweth forth righteousness: but a false witness deceit.
verses.ct: An honest witness reveals the truth, but a dishonest witness spreads lies.

verses.kjv: There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health.
verses.ct: Reckless words cut like a sword, but the tongue of the wise brings healing.

verses.kjv: The lip of truth shall be established for ever: but a lying tongue is but for a moment.
verses.ct: Truthful speech stands firm forever, but a lying tongue lasts only a moment.

verses.kjv: Deceit is in the heart of them that imagine evil: but to the counsellors of peace is joy.
verses.ct: Deception fills the hearts of those who plot evil, but those who promote peace find joy.

verses.kjv: There shall no evil happen to the just: but the wicked shall be filled with mischief.
verses.ct: No real harm comes to the righteous, but the wicked are overwhelmed with trouble.

verses.kjv: Lying lips are abomination to the LORD: but they that deal truly are his delight.
verses.ct: The LORD despises lying lips, but people who act with honesty are his delight.

verses.kjv: A prudent man concealeth knowledge: but the heart of fools proclaimeth foolishness.
verses.ct: A sensible person keeps their knowledge to themselves, but the heart of a fool broadcasts foolishness.

verses.kjv: The hand of the diligent shall bear rule: but the slothful shall be under tribute.
verses.ct: Hard-working hands will gain authority, but lazy people will be put to forced labor.

verses.kjv: Heaviness in the heart of man maketh it stoop: but a good word maketh it glad.
verses.ct: Anxiety weighs down a person's heart, but an encouraging word lifts it up.

verses.kjv: The righteous is more excellent than his neighbour: but the way of the wicked seduceth them.
verses.ct: The righteous person guides their neighbor well, but the path of the wicked leads them astray.

verses.kjv: The slothful man roasteth not that which he took in hunting: but the substance of a diligent man is precious.
verses.ct: A lazy person doesn't even cook the game they caught, but a diligent person values what they have.

verses.kjv: In the way of righteousness is life: and in the pathway thereof there is no death.
verses.ct: The path of righteousness leads to life, and along that road there is no death.
